reviewText: LOVE HYUN BIN HE IS A GREAT ACTOR RIGHT UP WITH SUPER STAR
Hyun Bin picks good movies to be in. He really outshines the actress in this tale, and his emotions are visible, not to mention his great looks. Hyun Bin never disappoints
I didn't enjoy this story at all.  The scenes were all filmed in such dark surroundings and the story just dragged.  Some of the dramas that Hyun Bin chooses aren't very good.
